long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the game Seasons on Boardgamearena.com.
It pre-marks summoning gauge spaces by adding their number. This way, you always know at first glance how close you are of your maximum summoning gauge.
